issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Use `AppCompatResources.getDrawable()`
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@color/colorPrimary` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@android:style/Theme.Holo`)
